questions.question: What is Jenkins?
options: A continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) tool

questions.question: What is a Jenkins pipeline?
options: A graphical user interface (GUI) for Jenkins
A scripting language for defining CI/CD workflows
A Jenkins plugin for managing Docker containers
A distributed system for scaling Jenkins

questions.question: What is the purpose of Jenkins agents (formerly known as slaves)?
What is the recommended way to backup Jenkins configuration and data?
options: Manually copy the Jenkins home directory
Use the built-in Jenkins backup tool
Store Jenkins data in a Git repository
Never backup Jenkins, it is stateless

questions.question: What is the purpose of a Jenkinsfile?
What is the recommended approach to version Jenkinsfile?
options: Use the latest tag for all Jenkinsfile versions
Use random tags for Jenkinsfile versions

questions.question: What is the purpose of Jenkins plugins?
options: To extend the functionality of Jenkins

questions.question: What is the recommended approach to secure Jenkins?
options: Use strong passwords for Jenkins access
Enable security features like role-based access control
Keep Jenkins up to date with security patches

questions.question: What is the purpose of the Jenkins master?
What is the role of the Jenkins Global Library?
What is the recommended approach to handle secrets in Jenkins?
options: Store secrets in plain text in Jenkins configuration
Use a Jenkins plugin for secret management

questions.question: What is the purpose of the Jenkins Artifacts repository?
What is the recommended approach to trigger Jenkins pipelines?
What is the purpose of the Jenkins Blue Ocean UI?
options: To provide a modern and intuitive UI for Jenkins

questions.question: What is the recommended approach to handle parallel execution in Jenkins pipelines?
options: Use the built-in Jenkins parallel stage
Use Jenkins plugins for parallel execution

questions.question: What is the purpose of the Jenkins workspace?
options: To provide a working directory for builds

questions.question: What is the recommended approach to handle dependencies in Jenkins pipelines?
options: Install dependencies on Jenkins agents manually
Use Jenkins plugins for dependency management

questions.question: What is the purpose of Jenkins triggers?
What is the recommended approach to handle build artifacts in Jenkins?
options: Store artifacts on the Jenkins master
Store artifacts in a distributed file system
Use a Jenkins plugin for artifact management
Never store build artifacts in Jenkins
